data.description: RECEIVED MULTIPLE OFFERS!!!!Completely Renovated!!! 4 Sided Brick House With 5bds/ 2.5bths in Stone Mountain! New Roof, New Large Size Deck, Freshly Painted, Stainless Steel Appliances, Upgraded Bathrooms, Hardwood Flooring ON Up level, Family Room, Living Room and Dining Area, Separate Living and Dining Room, Family Room with The Fireplace, New Light Fixtures, Kitchen With Granite Countertops And Separate Breakfast Area, Up Stair Separate Office Room/ Study Room, 5th Bedroom on Basement, Large Size Front Covered Porch With New Railing, NO HOA, Minutes from Hwy 78/ I 285, SELLER/LISTING AGENT RELATIVE
